scripts.dev: npm run build-operations && cross-env WG_CLI_LOG_PRETTY=true START_HOOKS_SERVER=true WG_DIR_ABS=. ts-node fireboom.server.ts --files
scripts.build-operations: ts-node scripts/buildOperations.ts && tsc --project operations.tsconfig.json && tsc-alias -p operations.tsconfig.json
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production START_HOOKS_SERVER=true WG_DIR_ABS=. node fireboom.server.js
